TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InputManager extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject
Public NotInheritable Class InputManager Inherits DispatcherObject

summary.span: Manages all the input systems in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).

span.span: Manages all the input systems in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).

remarks.format: ## Remarks El clase es responsable de la coordinación de todos los sistemas de entrada en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].The class is responsible for coordinating all of the input systems in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. Un filtro es cualquier código que escucha o .A filter is any code that listens to or . Los filtros pueden modificar el área de ensayo de entrada.Filters can modify the input staging area. Un monitor es cualquier código que escucha o .A monitor is any code that listens to or . Monitores no pueden modificar el área de ensayo de entrada.Monitors cannot modify the input staging area. El controla el área de ensayo de entrada.The controls the input staging area. Procesa los datos en el área de ensayo entrado [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] eventos.The input staging area processes input into [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] events. Se procesa la entrada en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] en las siguientes fases:Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1. Fase de procesamiento previo.Pre-process stage. El Administrador de entrada genera el eventos.The input manager raises the event. 2. Fase de notificación previa.Pre-notify stage. El Administrador de entrada genera el eventos.The input manager raises the event. 3. El [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] entrada de evento o eventos se generan.The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised. 4. Posterior a la fase de notificación.Post-notify stage. El Administrador de entrada genera el eventos.The input manager raises the event. 5. Fase de procesamiento posterior.Post-process stage. El Administrador de entrada genera el eventos.The input manager raises the event.

public: static property System::Windows::Input::InputManager ^ Current { System::Windows::Input::InputManager ^ get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esta clase no estará disponible en la zona de Internet.This class will not be available in Internet zone.

summary.span: Occurs when a control enters menu mode by calling the method.

span.span: Occurs when a control enters menu mode by calling the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Los componentes registran los delegados con este evento para responder a un control de entrada al modo de menú del Administrador de entrada.Components register delegates with this event to respond to a control entering the input manager’s menu mode.

summary.span: Occurs when the result of a hit-test may have changed.

span.span: Occurs when the result of a hit-test may have changed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsInMenuMode As Boolean

summary.span: Gets a value that indicates whether this is in menu mode.

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether this is in menu mode.

value.span: Si este está en modo de menú; en caso contrario, .

span.span: if this is in menu mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks El propiedad devuelve `true` si los menús están abiertos, y devuelve `false` si no hay menús están abiertos.The property returns `true` if any menus are open, and it returns `false` if no menus are open.

summary.span: Occurs when a control leaves menu mode by calling the method.

span.span: Occurs when a control leaves menu mode by calling the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Los componentes registran los delegados con este evento para responder a un control de salir del modo de menú del Administrador de entrada.Components register delegates with this event to respond to a control leaving the input manager’s menu mode.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PopMenuMode(class System.Windows.PresentationSource menuSite) cil managed

span.span: The menu to leave.

summary.span: Called by components to leave menu mode.

span.span: Called by components to leave menu mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Un componente llama a este método para salir del modo de menú del Administrador de entrada.A component calls this method to leave the input manager’s menu mode. El `menuSite` libera el acceso privilegiado a los mensajes de ventana.The `menuSite` releases privileged access to window messages. Llamar a este método hace que el recuento interno de menús abiertos disminuya y establece la propiedad `false`, si se trata del último menú para cerrar.Calling this method causes the internal count of open menus to decrement and sets the property to `false`, if this is the last menu to close.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PostNotifyInput As NotifyInputEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs after the handlers have finished processing the input and the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] events have been raised.

span.span: Occurs after the handlers have finished processing the input and the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] events have been raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Un monitor es cualquier código que escucha o .A monitor is any code that listens to or . Monitores no pueden modificar el área de ensayo de entrada.Monitors cannot modify the input staging area. Los controladores se asocian a se invocan en orden inverso para que los controladores agregados por los usuarios se invocan antes que los controladores en el sistema.The handlers attached to are invoked in reverse order so that handlers added by the users are invoked before handlers in the system. Se procesa la entrada en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] en las siguientes fases:Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1. Fase de procesamiento previo.Pre-process stage. El Administrador de entrada genera el eventos.The input manager raises the event. 2. Fase de notificación previa.Pre-notify stage. El Administrador de entrada genera el eventos.The input manager raises the event. 3. El [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] entrada de evento o eventos se generan.The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised. 4. Posterior a la fase de notificación.Post-notify stage. El Administrador de entrada genera el eventos.The input manager raises the event. 5. Fase de procesamiento posterior.Post-process stage. El Administrador de entrada genera el eventos.The input manager raises the event.

permission.span: Para agregar o quitar un controlador de eventos.

span.span: for adding or removing an event handler.
Associated enumerations:

Los controladores se asocian a se invocan en orden inverso para que los controladores agregados por los usuarios se invocan antes que los controladores en el sistema.The handlers attached to are invoked in reverse order so that handlers added by the users are invoked before handlers in the system. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ProcessInput(class System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs input) cil managed
Public Function ProcessInput (input As InputEventArgs) As Boolean

span.span: The input to process.
Processes the specified input synchronously.

returns.span: if all input events were handled; otherwise, .

span.span: if all input events were handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Un filtro es cualquier código que escucha o .A filter is any code that listens to or . Los filtros pueden modificar el área de ensayo de entrada.Filters can modify the input staging area. Un monitor es cualquier código que escucha o .A monitor is any code that listens to or . Monitores no pueden modificar el área de ensayo de entrada.Monitors cannot modify the input staging area. La entrada especificada es procesada por todos los filtros y los monitores y por último, se envía al elemento adecuado como un evento de entrada.The specified input is processed by all the filters and monitors and is finally dispatched to the appropriate element as an input event. Se procesa la entrada en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] en las siguientes fases:Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1. Fase de procesamiento previo.Pre-process stage. El Administrador de entrada genera el eventos.The input manager raises the event. 2. Fase de notificación previa.Pre-notify stage. El Administrador de entrada genera el eventos.The input manager raises the event. 3. El [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] entrada de evento o eventos se generan.The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised. 4. Posterior a la fase de notificación.Post-notify stage. El Administrador de entrada genera el eventos.The input manager raises the event. 5. Fase de procesamiento posterior.Post-process stage. El Administrador de entrada genera el eventos.The input manager raises the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PushMenuMode(class System.Windows.PresentationSource menuSite) cil managed

span.span: The menu to enter.

summary.span: Called by components to enter menu mode.

span.span: Called by components to enter menu mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Un componente llama a este método para entrar en modo de menú del Administrador de entrada.A component calls this method to enter the input manager’s menu mode. El `menuSite` obtiene acceso privilegiado a los mensajes de ventana.The `menuSite` gets privileged access to window messages. Llamar a este método hace que el recuento interno de menús abiertos aumente y establece la propiedad `true`, si se trata del primer menú Abrir.Calling this method causes the internal count of open menus to increment and sets the property to `true`, if this is the first menu to open.

span.span: is .
